definitions.text: a quantity obtained by the addition of a group of numbers
add up in number or quantity

examples: Add all the people in this town to those of the neighboring town

definitions.text: damage beyond the point of repair
examples: My son totaled our new car
the rock star totals his guitar at every concert

definitions.text: constituting the full quantity or extent; complete
examples: an entire town devastated by an earthquake

definitions.text: complete in extent or degree and in every particular
